Hey @carpodaster and @cypher. Sounds good. I'll take a look at this PR and see how I can help. 👍

In the meantime, I've also implemented the ApplicationDrafts#apply controller action here: ramonh@91d4f4b

EDIT: I've made this into its own feature branch

body:
Hey @carpodaster and @cypher. Sounds good. I'll take a look at this PR and see how I can help. :+1: 

In the meantime, I've also implemented the `ApplicationDrafts#apply` controller action here: ramonh@91d4f4bfd391b3aa5a2972cadaff1cd722ab8fe5
